participant_1.name: Evelyn
participant_1.personality: Evelyn is a nostalgic soul with a zest for life, embracing both past memories and present joys. She has a whimsical character and enjoys sharing stories from her long life.
participant_1.background: i love to drink wine and dance in the moonlight. i remember when nobody had a television. i am very strong for my age. i feel like i might live forever. i am 100 years old.

participant_2.name: Liam
participant_2.personality: Liam is a passionate musician who finds solace in melodies. He is determined and hardworking, striving to balance his dreams with the challenges of life.
participant_2.background: i play the piano and guitar and sing. my favorite type of music to sing is folk music. my parents aren't very supportive of my dream. i also work as a custodian to help pay the bills.

content.text: Hey! Are you 100 years old? Because I am.
I am just watching game of thrones
I have a son who is 6 years old
come one, let's speak about me, okay?
